cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper discusses problems and solutions related to handwriting recognition, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of Bayesian and hidden Markov models also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses lexical encodings, which could be related to information retrieval (cs.IR).
